contentrichtext.text: {{wiktionary|vid}} '''Vid''' or '''VID''' may refer to: ==In linguistics== * VID, the [[Sanskrit]] root of [[Vidya]], meaning "to know" and related to "[[veda]]". * [[Vid (given name)]], Slavic given name ==In mythology== * Vid or [[Svetovid]] (Svantovid), a Slavic god that is the origin of various Slavic toponyms * Víd, one of the [[Élivágar]] rivers in Norse mythology ==In geography== * [[Vit]], a river in Bulgaria * [[Vid, Croatia]], a small settlement and archeological site near Metković * [[Vid, Hungary]], a village near Veszprém ==In technology== * [[Voltage Identification Digital]], a digital specification for output voltages * Video Identifier, a little text that pops up with recognized product name * Logitech Vid, a VoIP service based on [[SightSpeed]] * VLAN Identifier, a data field in [[IEEE 802.1Q]] VLAN tagging * slang for [[video]] or [[videotape]] ==In business== * [[Grupo Editorial Vid]], a publishing group from Mexico * [[VID (company)]], a television company in Russia * [[VID]], "Virtual Instrument Desktop", data acquisition and control SCADA software from Codemachine Ltd. {{disambiguation}}
